hidenbt.title: HideNBT
hidenbt.config.hidenbt.title: Hide NBT Tags
hidenbt.config.hidenbt.desc: Hides the "NBT Tag(s): #" tooltip on enchanted or modified items.
hidenbt.config.hideid.title: Hide Minecraft ID
hidenbt.config.hideid.desc: Hides the item's Minecraft ID tooltip.
hidenbt.config.hidearmormat.title: Hide Armor Material
hidenbt.config.hidearmormat.desc: Hides the armor material tooltip provided by the Armor Chroma mod.
